warezcdn.name: Cheat Kusushi no Slow Life: Isekai ni Tsukurou Drugstore
warezcdn.title: Cheat Kusushi no Slow Life: Isekai ni Tsukurou Drug Store

imdb.title: Cheat Kusushi no Slow Life: Isekai ni Tsukurou Drug Store
imdb.plot: A salary worker comes to another world and takes it easy with a slow life running a drugstore.

episodes.title: Super (Energy) Potion/Landenflower Tea/Botanical Deodorant
episodes.plot: Reiji invents an energy drink for curing exhaustion, tea for reducing anxiety and deodorant to remove foul odors.

episodes.title: Dishwashing Detergent Scrubba-dub-dub/Beast-Be-Gone/Capshin Fluid
episodes.plot: Reiji invents detergent fluid to make cleaning easier, pesticide to preserve crops and pepper spray to aid soldiers with bandits.

episodes.title: Beautiful Belle's Beautiful Skin Gel/Charm Fragrance/Sweetheart Cooling Gel
episodes.plot: Reiji invents moisturizing cream for a noblewoman, a perfume for her daughter and cooling gel for her father.

episodes.title: Rokushou Sauce/Emotional Drive
episodes.plot: Reiji invents a special sauce from rare nuts to help a flagging restaurant. Later on, he invents an aphrodisiac for a client, but it gets drunk by his assistants.

episodes.title: Come Here Beast Lure/Mother's Brooch/Stomach Acheless
episodes.plot: Reiji invents a medicine to attract wild animals to aid a huntress, and later a medicine to repel animals from garbage. Later, he helps out Mina with travelling out of her home.

episodes.title: Stuck-In-Place Super Glue/Glossy Shine Polish
episodes.plot: Reiji helps out a blacksmith by inventing super glue and polish.

episodes.title: Woof? Advent of the Demon King!/Give It to Me Straight
episodes.plot: A demon king arrives at Reiji's shop to raise trouble. Meanwhile, Reiji invents a truth serum.

episodes.title: Odorless Body Soap!/Three-Minute Revive
episodes.plot: Reiji invents soap for a lord who wishes to connect with his adolescent daughter. Later on, he invents a potion that can temporarily raise the dead to aid a friend.

episodes.title: Big Catch Buddy/Harriette Remover
episodes.plot: Reiji goes fishing, and meets the lake spirit Vivi. He later makes hair removal cream on the request of women, but Noela gets her hands on it.

episodes.title: Power Potion/RK Gene Fluid
episodes.plot: Reiji develops a muscle potion to become stronger, and later on develops a body scent based on his own fluid to help a Demon King get close to Noela.

episodes.title: Pass, No Fail/Sun Sun Go Away Sunscreen Gel
episodes.plot: Reiji develops a memory potion to help Paula with her studies, and later develops sunscreen and moisturizer for sunny weather.

episodes.title: Let's Open a Drugstore in Another World!
